message:
If you don't know about it, you should.
---------------------------------------------
What is Scrum?
--
Scrum is a framework for developing and sustaining complex products. This Guide contains the 
definition of Scrum. This definition consists of Scrumâ€™s roles, events, artifacts, and the rules that 
bind them together. 
Ken Schwaber and Jeff Sutherland developed Scrum; the Scrum Guide is 
written and provided by them. Together, they stand behind the Scrum Guide.
story: Mohammed El Sayed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: What is Scrum? | Scrum.org - The home of Scrum
caption: scrum.org
description: What is Scrum? Scrum.org explains the Scrum basics, how Scrum is used, and how it works. Gain a very basic understanding of Scrum here!
